title: Harley Hitch and the Iron Forest
description: A highly illustrated fiction series about a determined young inventor, from award-winning author Vashti Hardy.Join Harley, her robot dog Sprocket and best friend Cosmo for problem-solving adventures and mysteries in Inventia, a world where science rules and technology grows in the forest; and where exploding science projects, giant slugs and runaway robots are all part of a normal school day.The Iron Forest near Harley’s home is unlike any other – plants and trees grow cogs and hinges and other mechanical parts – and all of Inventia depends on it. So when a strange fungus is discovered, there’s a race to find a solution. Without essential parts for inventions, the town is quickly falling apart…But just who or what is behind the mysterious infestation? Harley decides it’s up to her to save the day – with chaotic results!
author: Vashti Hardy
